languages.text: "Смотрите, {name}! Силы, питающие сей артефакт, уже на исходе! Если воздействовать на него еще немного, я знаю, что смогу его вытащить. Однако после произошедшего я уже не уверена, что Фелек и остальные были так уж неправы на мой счет".

traits.locale_text: "Смотрите, {name}! Силы, питающие сей артефакт, уже на исходе! Если воздействовать на него еще немного, я знаю, что смогу его вытащить. Однако после произошедшего я уже не уверена, что Фелек и остальные были так уж неправы на мой счет".

languages.text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."
languages.original_text: "Смотрите, {name}! Силы, питающие сей артефакт, уже на исходе! Если воздействовать на него еще немного, я знаю, что смогу его вытащить. Однако после произошедшего я уже не уверена, что Фелек и остальные были так уж неправы на мой счет".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. Although, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain that Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

"{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

"{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

"{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

languages.text: 「{name}、見てください！このアーティファクトを支えているエネルギーは尽きようとしています！もうひと押しすれば、外せるでしょう。でも、今日こんなことがあって、フェレックたちが私のことを誤解していたと言えるのかどうか、もう分からなくなりました」
languages.original_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、見てください！このアーティファクトを支えているエネルギーは尽きようとしています！もうひと押しすれば、外せるでしょう。でも、今日こんなことがあって、フェレックたちが私のことを誤解していたと言えるのかどうか、もう分からなくなりました」

languages.text: “快看，{name}！这件造物的能量几乎已经消失了！只要我再努力一把，就能把它摘下来了！不过，我原本坚信费雷克和其他人对我的看法是错误的，可如今发生了这样的事情，我已经不再确定了。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

traits.locale_text: “快看，{name}！这件造物的能量几乎已经消失了！只要我再努力一把，就能把它摘下来了！不过，我原本坚信费雷克和其他人对我的看法是错误的，可如今发生了这样的事情，我已经不再确定了。”

languages.text: «¡{name}, mire! ¡Las energías que alimentan este artefacto están casi agotadas! Si hiciera un último esfuerzo, sé que sería capaz de extraerlo. Sin embargo, después de lo ocurrido hoy, ya no estoy segura de que Felek y los demás estuvieran tan equivocados conmigo».
languages.original_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}, mire! ¡Las energías que alimentan este artefacto están casi agotadas! Si hiciera un último esfuerzo, sé que sería capaz de extraerlo. Sin embargo, después de lo ocurrido hoy, ya no estoy segura de que Felek y los demás estuvieran tan equivocados conmigo».

languages.text: "{name}, seht! Die Energien, die dieses Artefakt nähren, sind fast erschöpft! Noch ein kleiner Schubser, dann könnte ich es entfernen, das weiß ich. Aber nach allem, was heute geschehen ist ... Lagen Felekt und die anderen wirklich falsch, was mich angeht? Ich weiß es nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, seht! Die Energien, die dieses Artefakt nähren, sind fast erschöpft! Noch ein kleiner Schubser, dann könnte ich es entfernen, das weiß ich. Aber nach allem, was heute geschehen ist ... Lagen Felekt und die anderen wirklich falsch, was mich angeht? Ich weiß es nicht mehr."

languages.text: « {name}, regardez ! Les énergies qui alimentent l'artefact sont presque épuisées ! Peut-être qu'en les consommant complètement, je pourrais le retirer... Mais vu les événements d'aujourd'hui, je ne peux m'empêcher de penser que Felek et les autres avaient peut-être raison à mon sujet. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, regardez ! Les énergies qui alimentent l'artefact sont presque épuisées ! Peut-être qu'en les consommant complètement, je pourrais le retirer... Mais vu les événements d'aujourd'hui, je ne peux m'empêcher de penser que Felek et les autres avaient peut-être raison à mon sujet. »

languages.text: "{name}, baksana! Bu eserin devamını sağlayan enerjiler neredeyse tükenmiş hâlde! Biraz daha zorlarsam çıkarabileceğimi biliyorum. Ancak bugün olanlardan sonra Felek ve diğerlerinin hakkımda yanıldığından emin olamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "{name}, look! The energies sustaining this artefact are almost depleted! Were I to give it just one more push, I know I would be able to remove it. However, after what transpired today, I am no longer certain if Felek and the others were so wrong about me."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, baksana! Bu eserin devamını sağlayan enerjiler neredeyse tükenmiş hâlde! Biraz daha zorlarsam çıkarabileceğimi biliyorum. Ancak bugün olanlardan sonra Felek ve diğerlerinin hakkımda yanıldığından emin olamıyorum."
